message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $14,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $12,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your proposed price. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's my final offer.
